oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Flushed From The Bathroom Of Your Heart - Johnny Cash performance; Dirty Old Egg Sucking Dog - Johnny Cash performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Flushed From The Bathroom Of Your Heart, written by Jack H. Clement, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on January 11, 1966 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, and performed by Johnny Cash (vocal and guitar), the Carter family (background vocals), Luther Perkins (guitar), Norman Blake (dobro), Marshall Grant (bass), and W.S. Holland (drums). Performance of Dirty Old Egg Sucking Dog, written by Jack H. Clement, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on January 11, 1966 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, and performed by Johnny Cash (vocal and guitar), the Carter family (background vocals), Luther Perkins (guitar), Marshall Grant (bass), and W.S. Holland (drums).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Cash
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Johnny Cash performs "Flushed From The Bathroom Of Your Heart" / (2:10) Johnny Cash performs "Dirty Old Egg Sucking Dog"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Clement, Jack; Cash, Johnny, 1932-2003; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; Columbia Records, Inc; Carter Family (Musical group); Perkins, Luther; Blake, Norman, 1938-; Grant, Marshall (Bassist); Holland, W. S.
